channel.title: Need help whit small thing for server
channel.description:
So i need some help whit small 'details' on a server.
Its about getting it online eventhough i think i changed the client.java ip's the right way, canyousee me is a succes.
And when i send the rar client to friends to play whit me it gets stuck in loading and doesnt continue
You can add my skype: nickycliquet
Thanks

item.title: Need help whit small thing for server
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

I already helped her with it.

This can be closed or forgotten.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help whit small thing for server

item.title: Need help whit small thing for server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Si Force:

What part of the loading does it get stuck at?

Probably "Loading: 0%"
because the server isn’t online (port wise or its literally not on) or the client isn’t connecting to it.

OP: If you use Windows Firewall, either add an exception to it for both inbound and outbound connections on port 43594, or disable it (I’d go with option A).
Verify that you compiled the client after changing all the IPs needed in your client (I have heard the 718+ clients have a couple of places you might need to change it, im unaware of where though).
And make sure the server is online before your friends try running the .jar of your client.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help whit small thing for server
